snippet: A primary challenge from Senator Adriano Espaillat could test Latino voters’ influence in Representative Charles B. Rangel’s Congressional district, which now has a Hispanic majority.
abstract: Adriano Espaillat, New York State senator who represents Washington Heights, says he will challenge Rep Charles B Rangel for his congressional seat; announcement sets the stage for a campaign that could test the strength of Latino influence in the district.
lead_paragraph: A primary challenge from Senator Adriano Espaillat could test Latino voters’ influence in Representative Charles B. Rangel’s Congressional district, which now has a Hispanic majority.

headline.seo: Senator Adriano Espaillat Will Challenge Rangel
headline.main: Manhattan State Senator Says He’ll Challenge Rangel
headline.print_headline: A Manhattan State Senator Says He’ll Challenge Rangel
